attributes.additional_details: To privatise the utility companies to stop the utility company bosses getting high bonuses while low income families can't pay their utility bills.
attributes.background: To privatise the utility companies to stop the utility company bosses getting high bonuses while low income families can't pay their utility bills.

rejection.details:
Utility companies are already privatised. Decisions about remuneration for privately employed workers, including bonuses, are a matter for individual employers, not the UK Government or Parliament.

If you meant that you want utility companies to be nationalised, we have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Nationalise energy companies: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/621719

Renationalise water: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/620881
